title: FIB - Integrate FIB Tool in PANDA - AutoAdd Locations
description:
Business Scope:
As a user of PANDA and the integrated offer, I want Locations that are added to a quote and an AGP via external means, to be added to AGP and quote in the FIB tool to use them in the PANDA workflow.
acceptance_criteria: When PANDA (CPQ or Integrated Offer Cart) gets locations connected to an AGP or a Quote from an external source, a check is done, if the locations are already added to the AGP
If they are already available in the AGP, they are added to the quote
If they are not yet added to the AGP, they are added to the AGP and the Quote.
If they are freshly added, the KLS check is run and the FTTH status is requested automatically

attachments.filename: Epic for Q2 - AutoAdd locations to FIB - Tasks in Sprint 3.msg
